title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5102.19 - Restriction on employment of a former surveillance department employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5102.19 - Restriction on employment of a former surveillance department employee

State Regulations

No former video lottery gaming agent surveillance
department employee shall accept employment in another capacity for the video
lottery gaming agent within the same video lottery gaming facility in which
such surveillance department employee was previously employed or within any
other video lottery gaming facility whose surveillance department is under the
operational control of the same person who controlled the surveillance
department in which the surveillance department employee had been previously
employed, unless one year has passed since the former surveillance department
employee worked in the surveillance department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5102.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
